episodeTitle: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!
titleJapanese: G5壊滅！ドフラミンゴ急襲！
description: The Straw Hat crew, along with Law, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke, sail toward Dressrosa on the Thousand Sunny. Meanwhile, on Punk Hazard, Doflamingo arrives and brutally attacks the G-5 Marines. When Smoker intervenes to protect his men, he is gravely injured. Just as Doflamingo prepares to finish Smoker, Kuzan appears and saves his former colleague.

events.title: Straw Hats Depart Punk Hazard
events.description: The Straw Hat Pirates, along with Law, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke, set sail from Punk Hazard aboard the Thousand Sunny, heading toward Dressrosa.
events.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Punk Hazard arc for the Straw Hats and the beginning of their journey to Dressrosa as part of Law's plan.

events.title: Crew Relaxes After Punk Hazard
events.description: The Straw Hat crew relaxes on the Thousand Sunny, with Kin'emon and Momonosuke sharing tea. Franky recounts the story of how he recovered the Thousand Sunny from the Navy.
events.significance: Provides character moments and reinforces the bonds between the crew and their new allies. Anime-original expansion adding levity after the intense Punk Hazard battles.

events.title: Sea Slope Navigation
events.description: The Thousand Sunny encounters a dramatic sea slope where the ocean current shifts at a steep angle, requiring skilled navigation to descend safely.
events.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous and unpredictable nature of the New World's seas, showcasing Nami's navigational skills.

quotes.text: This is the New World! The seas here don't follow normal rules!
quotes.speaker: Nami

events.title: Luffy Reveals Plan to Defeat Kaidou
events.description: Luffy explains to the Straw Hat crew the alliance's true goal: to take down Yonko Kaidou by destroying his SMILE supply through Doflamingo.
events.significance: Establishes the long-term goal of the alliance and sets up the conflict with one of the Four Emperors, a major storyline spanning multiple arcs.

quotes.text: We're going to take down Kaidou, one of the Four Emperors!
quotes.speaker: Luffy

events.title: Doflamingo Arrives on Punk Hazard
events.description: Donquixote Doflamingo descends from the sky onto Punk Hazard, where Caesar's former subordinates and the G-5 Marines are searching for petrified soldiers.
events.significance: Marks Doflamingo's first physical appearance on Punk Hazard and the beginning of his direct confrontation with the Marines, establishing him as a major threat.

quotes.text: Fufufufu... What a mess you've made here.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo
quotes.context: First words upon arriving at Punk Hazard

events.title: Doflamingo Uses Conqueror's Haki
events.description: Before the G-5 Marines can attack, Doflamingo unleashes Conqueror's Haki (Haoshoku Haki), instantly knocking out the vast majority of the soldiers.
events.significance: First display of Doflamingo's Conqueror's Haki, establishing him as one of the elite few capable of this rare ability and demonstrating his overwhelming power.

events.title: Parasite Technique Revealed
events.description: Doflamingo uses his Devil Fruit's Parasite technique to control the remaining conscious G-5 Marines, forcing them to attack each other against their will.
events.significance: First clear demonstration of Doflamingo's ability to control people like puppets using his strings, showcasing the terrifying nature of the Ito Ito no Mi.

quotes.text: You're all just puppets dancing on my strings.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo

events.title: Smoker Confronts Doflamingo
events.description: Vice Admiral Smoker steps forward to defend his G-5 subordinates from Doflamingo, demanding he stop his attack and launching his White Blow technique.
events.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's loyalty to his men and willingness to stand against a Warlord. Sets up the power difference between them.

quotes.text: Don't you dare lay another finger on my men, Doflamingo!
quotes.speaker: Smoker

events.title: Smoker Reveals Knowledge of Vergo
events.description: During their confrontation, Smoker derisively mentions Vergo's involvement in Doflamingo's operations, revealing that he learned about the underworld connections.
events.significance: Confirms that Smoker now knows about Doflamingo's underworld operations and the connection to Vergo, making him a liability that Doflamingo must silence.

quotes.text: I know all about Vergo and your dirty operations, Joker!
quotes.speaker: Smoker

events.title: Smoker Gravely Injured by Doflamingo
events.description: Doflamingo's attack is redirected when Smoker uses his body as a shield to protect his subordinates, resulting in severe injuries to the Vice Admiral. Doflamingo prepares to deliver a finishing blow.
events.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's selflessness and the vast power gap between him and Doflamingo. Places Smoker in mortal danger.

events.title: Kuzan Appears on Punk Hazard
events.description: Former Admiral Kuzan (Aokiji) suddenly appears on Punk Hazard, interrupting Doflamingo before he can kill Smoker. He asks Doflamingo to step aside, calling Smoker his friend.
events.significance: Kuzan's unexpected appearance saves Smoker's life and raises questions about why the former Admiral is on Punk Hazard. First time seeing Kuzan since his departure from the Marines.

quotes.text: Mind stepping aside, Doflamingo? That man is my friend.
quotes.speaker: Kuzan

events.title: Doflamingo Backs Down from Kuzan
events.description: Recognizing the threat posed by a former Admiral, Doflamingo decides not to fight Kuzan and prepares to leave Punk Hazard.
events.significance: Establishes that even Doflamingo respects Kuzan's power. Creates mystery about Kuzan's current status and motivations.

quotes.text: Fufufu... I'm not interested in fighting you today, Kuzan.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo
quotes.context: Deciding to retreat rather than face Kuzan

quotes.text: We're going to take down Kaidou, one of the Four Emperors!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Revealing the alliance's plan to the crew

quotes.text: Fufufufu... What a mess you've made here.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo

quotes.text: Don't you dare lay another finger on my men, Doflamingo!
quotes.speaker: Smoker

quotes.text: Mind stepping aside, Doflamingo? That man is my friend.
quotes.speaker: Kuzan

themes.description: Smoker willingly puts himself in harm's way to protect his subordinates from Doflamingo's attack, demonstrating the bond between the Vice Admiral and his men.
themes.symbolism: Smoker using his body as a shield represents the Marine ideal of protecting those under your command, even at great personal cost.

themes.description: Doflamingo's overwhelming display of Conqueror's Haki and puppet manipulation establishes him as a fearsome villain who operates on a different level from most antagonists.
themes.symbolism: The puppet strings represent control, manipulation, and the loss of free will - key themes in Doflamingo's character.

themes.description: Kuzan's appearance raises questions about his current loyalties and motivations after leaving the Marines, adding intrigue to his character.
themes.symbolism: Kuzan appearing from nowhere represents his new role as a wildcard, no longer bound by Marine structure.

characterSpotlights.development: Doflamingo is established as a truly menacing villain with overwhelming power, including Conqueror's Haki and terrifying Devil Fruit abilities that allow him to control people like puppets.
keyActions: Arrives on Punk Hazard from the sky
Uses Conqueror's Haki to knock out most G-5 Marines
Backs down when confronted by Kuzan
quotes: Fufufufu... What a mess you've made here.
You're all just puppets dancing on my strings.

characterSpotlights.development: Demonstrates his deep loyalty to his subordinates by willingly taking a devastating attack meant for them, nearly costing him his life.
keyActions: Confronts Doflamingo to protect G-5 Marines
Mentions knowledge of Vergo and underworld operations
Uses his body as a shield for his men
quotes: Don't you dare lay another finger on my men, Doflamingo!
I know all about Vergo and your dirty operations, Joker!

characterSpotlights.development: Makes his first post-Marine appearance, saving his former colleague Smoker and creating questions about his current status and motivations.
keyActions: Intervenes to save Smoker from certain death
Causes Doflamingo to retreat without fighting
quotes: Mind stepping aside, Doflamingo? That man is my friend.

characterSpotlights.development: Reveals the true scope of the alliance's ambitions to his crew, showing his growth in taking on challenges against the world's strongest pirates.
keyActions: Explains the plan to defeat Kaidou to the crew
Sails toward Dressrosa with Law and allies
quotes: We're going to take down Kaidou, one of the Four Emperors!

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime significantly expanded the battle sequence between Doflamingo and Smoker with enhanced animation detail and additional combat choreography.
Added anime-original scenes of the Straw Hats relaxing on the Thousand Sunny, including Kin'emon and Momonosuke sharing tea and Franky recounting the Thousand Sunny's recovery.
In the manga, Doflamingo's control of the Marines is more implied, while the anime explicitly shows him using strings to make them shoot each other.

trivia.fact: This episode features drastically improved animation quality during the Doflamingo vs Smoker fight, with detailed choreography and fluid movements.
The episode achieved a 9.2% TV rating in Japan, showing strong viewer interest in Doflamingo's confrontation with the Marines.
This is the first time in the anime that Doflamingo's ability is explicitly referred to as a Devil Fruit power.
The eyecatcher for this episode features Sanji with the One Piece logo.
This episode adapts material from Chapter 698 of the manga, specifically pages 2-14 and 18-19.
